node.title: Blue Wiggle Anthony Field donates ARIA-nominated album to late veteran's family
node.alt: A young man in a black beanie in a hospital.
node.description: Anthony Field says Brendan Nikolajew was a remarkable friend who taught him "how to live" and "how to die". Now the soldier and father of two is up for the most presitgious of Australian music awards.
node.content:
["Blue Wiggle Anthony Field has donated\u00a0all songwriting credits from the latest Wiggle's album\u00a0to a war veteran and his family.", "Afghanistan veteran Brendan Nikolajew died from testicular cancer on July 27.", "All royalties for the writing of the 2021 album Lullabies With Love will go to his wife, Leah\u00a0and their two children.", "The 21-track album is nominated for a 2021 ARIA for best children's album.", "Field said Mr Nikolajew found this to be a humorous twist.", "\"I took my name off all the songwriting and put Brendan's name instead, and gave him all the royalties and credits,\" the musician said.", "\"We had a good laugh about this, because it's nominated for an ARIA award, so if we win the ARIA\u00a0that ARIA is going straight to Leah and the family, and we'll get Brendan's name engraved on it.", "\"It would be fantastic \u2014 I mean, he's got so many medals from his service and now he might end up with an ARIA\u00a0too.", "", "
Anthony Field has been a member of The Wiggles since 1991.(Supplied)
", "
'One in a million'
", "Field, who is also an Army veteran, got to know\u00a0Mr Nikolajew two and a half years before he died.", "\"He's one of those people you are very lucky to meet in your life. He was one in a million,\" Field said.", "Field spoke to Mr Nikolajew shortly before he passed away.", "\"Brendan lost his niece in the lead-up to his death and we had a good talk about that,\" he said.", "\"I said to Brendan, 'What's going to happen when you pass over?'", "\"He said, 'I'm going straight to my little niece' \u2014 that's the sort of man he was and I know he would be there now, looking after her.\"", "The ARIA award winners will be announced on November 24.", "Mr Nikolajew was living in Brisbane, but is from Heyfield, in eastern Victoria."]
